time_horizons.t1: 0–3 months: quick wins, pipeline, hiring first key roles
time_horizons.t2: 3–12 months: product milestones, first revenue, partnership LOIs
time_horizons.t3: 1–5 years: scale, market position, optionality (M&A, raise)
time_horizons.t4: 5+ years: category leadership, exit or sustainable growth
